actions.name: Spirit Call

cost.trigger: A creature within range of the user uses a Ghost-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: A creature within range of the user uses a Ghost-Type attack.
Effect: The triggering attack hits the user instead, dealing no damage and applying no effects. Additionally, the user raises their SPATK stage by +1 for 5 activations.
